name: Ice Brink
description:
Created by Team Ice Studios which includes:

Costas: Lead Programming, Level Design and Bugs and Fixes

Shantanu: Sound Design, Sprite and Animation Design

As  an explorer and adventurer, you have been tasked by your organization to climb the fabled Mt. Brink, where it is said that treasure rests at the top of the mountain. You must traverse through the dangers of the mountain to rise to the occasion and complete the task at hand.

Use the AD keys to move, the W key to attack and the Spacebar to jump. Good Luck!
